com.facebook.buck.features.apple.projectV2

Class ProjectSourcePathResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.features.apple.projectV2.ProjectSourcePathResolver

  • public class ProjectSourcePathResolver
extends Object
    Helper class to resolve SourcePaths to the cell in which we generate the Xcode project.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProjectSourcePathResolver

        public ProjectSourcePathResolver(Cell projectCell,
                                 SourcePathResolverAdapter pathSourcePathResolverAdapter,
                                 TargetGraph targetGraph,
                                 java.util.function.Function<? super TargetNode<?>,ActionGraphBuilder> actionGraphBuilderForNode)
        Parameters:
        projectCell - Cell to which the project target belongs.
        pathSourcePathResolverAdapter - Source path resolver to use for PathSourcePaths.
        targetGraph - Target graph for the project target.
        actionGraphBuilderForNode - Action graph builder for the project target.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveSourcePath

        public Path resolveSourcePath(SourcePath sourcePath)
        Resolve a relative path to the project cell's filesystem. PathSourcePaths utilize the pathSourcePathResolverAdapter to resolve the path. Otherwise the sourcePath is expected to be a BuildTargetSourcePath for which we derive the target and resolve it's output to the cell.
        Parameters:
        sourcePath - Source path to resolve.
        Returns:
        A path relative to the cell.
